snippet: Forget the Jagr salute, Tebowing is all the rage on the ice.
abstract: Forget the Jagr salute, Tebowing is all the rage on the ice.
lead_paragraph: Forget the Jagr salute, Tebowing is all the rage on the ice, especially after Tim Tebow led the Broncos to a 29-23 overtime victory against the Steelers on Sunday. Kings defenseman Jack Johnson scored in the second period against the Capitals late Monday night and promptly got down on one knee in celebration. (Colton Orr did the same during Leafs Nation Fan Night on Dec. 20.)
